name: Outlook Email Message Data File
summary: Learn about .OLK14MSGSOURCE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: While OLK14MSGSOURCE files store the email message content, OLK14MESSAGE files only store header information. When browsing email message lists, the data in OLK14MESSAGE files is loaded, and when focusing on a specific email message, the data in an OLK14MSGSOURCE file is loaded. This allows the software to operate more efficiently.

description: Data file created by Outlook for Mac, an email program first released with the Office 2011 suite; contains all email source data for a message referenced in an .OLK14MESSAGE file; loaded when viewing a specific email message.
